name: Cloud (itch) (Windlike)
description:
You are a cloud.and you want to see the beautiful world.

HOW TO PLAY
  • Collecting white cloud to get more score.
  • Using space to control your cloud.
CREW

I am a student and Cloud is the first game I made.Musics are offered by DOBGM. We hope you will enjoy the game, don't hesitate to share and leave a comment!
